exploreMoreDescription: Discover our full range of premium vitamins and supplements
aboutContent: Highly effective 12.5 mg Vitamin B6 per vegan tablet. This essential nutrient supports the healthy functioning of the nervous and immune systems, promotes metabolism and energy supply, and helps reduce fatigue. Our supplement contains no preservatives, artificial flavours, or dyes and is GMO and gluten free. Manufactured to GMP standards with a 100% money-back guarantee.
descriptionContent: Nutriota's high-quality Vitamin B6 (from pyridoxine hydrochloride) is part of the essential B-vitamin group that supports emotional balance, mood, and healthy energy levels. As our body cannot produce Vitamin B6, it must be obtained from diet or supplements. Each bottle contains 365 tablets, made in a GMP compliant facility. We offer a complete risk-free satisfaction guarantee.
ingredientsContent: Vitamin B6 (as pyridoxine hydrochloride) 50 mg, microcrystalline cellulose, calcium carbonate DC, magnesium stearate, silicon dioxide
informationContent: Units: 365 count | Brand: Nutriota | Format: Tablet | Age Range Description: Adult
